content: an easy asymmetrical crochet shawlette made from a single ball of dk weight cake yarn this pattern is ideal for any skill level and is a simple elegant design it s a perfect way to use that special yarn cake you ve been saving only 2 ends to weave in this boomerang crochet shawl is a beautiful eye-catching accessory that s as fun to make as it is to wear this shawlette is a smaller more compact version of a crochet shawl designed for just enough coverage to keep you warm without the bulk of a full-sized shawl or a scarf you can find the written pattern free on my blog and the paid pdf pattern includes a crochet chart **measurements** shawl pictured measures 74in 188cm on the longest length and 18in 45cm depth after blocking
